Flow.description:
DB: 23 july
Flow Description: Add/Activate/Deactivate Bond Applicants and is launched from the Wrap Up Opportunity Bond Subflow which is ultimately launched from the Wrap Up Opportunity H2 flow
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.
Flow.label: Manage Applicants - Bond

recordLookups.name: Get_Contact_to_Contact_Relation_Spouse
recordLookups.label: Get Contact to Contact Relation Spouse

fields.name: bothActivated
fields.fieldText: Due to the marital agreement, both of the below COP Applicants will be Activated:

fields.name: displayInstru_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
• The main applicant cannot be deactivated.
  • A maximum of four Co Applicants are permitted on a bond.
  • If the marital agreement of the main applicant is Married in Community of Property, a Co Applicant is mandatory and cannot be deactivated.

fields.name: bothDeactivate
fields.fieldText: Due to the marital agreement, both of the below COP Applicants will be deactivated:
